Good game, but there are a lot of rough edges that need to be smoothed out before they start adding more things. Don't add more killers, fix pallets that are wrongly spawned even though they've already been destroyed. Don't add more survivors, fix offerings being wrongly burned when the game doesn't even happen because of the killer's connectivity issues. Don't add more maps, fix map terrain spawns that don't allow me to pass between spaces that are clearly there.
After nerfs of some ridiculous characters, the game is good.

Very fun game unfortunately ruined by delusional killer mains who want to kill everyone every single game to feel satisfied and complain in the forums all day. Because dead by daylight forums are basicly that. Post after post of inegligible complaints. Too bad the game is ruined by its awful community and the streamers who tell everyone"Oh were'e killer mains so it's okay to hate on survivors fuck them right?" Other than that, it's very unique and adrenaline pumping. I can't reccommend it to anyone planning to play survivor though, just because every killer seems to be as toxic as possible because they feel the game is ''against'' them whereas it isn't really. Unfortunately they don't realize it's a multiplayer game where other people want to have fun too. But no, if they don't get their 4man they are already right up the DBD subreddit bitching about something. If you can ignore the cries of the post game chat and promise yourself to never go on forums then buy it, it's cheap , it's one of a kind and most of all it's very good at what it does.

Friday the 13th'e göre çok daha güzel bir oyun bence. Doğru düzgün bir konusu var ve oyunda bir amacınız var.

Killer'ı öldürmek yok o yüzden bence Friday the 13th'den daha korkutucu (ikisini de oynadım bu arada).

Nedense kamera açısı olarak Friday'i hiç sevmemiştim ama bunda kamera açısı oldukça güzel.

Oyunda tek bir şey eksik o da arkadaşınızla aynı lobiye giremiyorsunuz. Ya 4 kişi olacaksınız ya da aynı anda "find a lobby" tuşuna basıp aynı server'a denk gelmeye çalışacaksınız.

Oyuna daha yeni başladım ama ilk aldığımda 4 saat üst üste oynadım. Gayet saran bir oyun. Fakat bir süre sonra jeneratörlerle uğraşmaktan sıkılcaz gibime geliyor. Hadi bakalım.

Oynu kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum, alın deneyin beğenmezseniz iade edin ki bence beğeneceksiniz.

Ben 15tl'ye aldım 15tl'yi hak ediyor ama 31tl'yi de hakediyor bence :D yine de indirim bekleyebiliyorsanız bekleyin.

Very fun game! Yes, Freddy is OP at the moment, but that is to be expected, and I'm sure the nerfhammer will be administered judiciously soon enough. This and White Noise 2 are easily the best asymmetric horror games out there right now. Dead By Daylight is a tension driving masterpiece that will work your myocardium like an accordion.
I go back and forwards on this game, but i keep playing it

This game is fun as hell to play with as a survivor or killer, but here is why i wouldnt reccomend playing it, even though i will still continue to play it myself: 
 
1. The survivors are very toxic, they will take the game hostage and try to taunt the killer right at the exit gates so they can hurridly leave (even if you play as freddy which i do and blood warden really isnt useful in that sense actually)

2. it takes an outrageous ammount of time (as a killer) to find a fucking game to play (for me its about 30 minutes per match, but ive seen others where its an hour wait), and then people will DC as soon as they realize its freddy, fun right?

3. As a survivor, many killers just want to camp you if your on the hook because usually people will try to unhook you, so actually trying to unhook people just goes away once you know the killer wants to camp everyone they catch. 

4. Survivors will constantly go through windows or stay around pallets to intentionally waste your time, and then laugh about it once the round is over 

5. Almost evertyime i try to play as a killer, my game freezes and i disconnect from the round, even though ive never had that problem as a survivor.

6. The devs dont seem to care about the game. at all. Many people have had their memory whiped from the game, there are still many bugs that need to be fixed, and yet they want to add more killers and survivors and maps to a game that already has a good ammount of bugs in it. To me it just seems like they want to gain some money with new killers as fast as they can rather than actually trying to balance the game to help survivors and killers and to fix constantly occuring bugs that basically force people to rage quit.


This game is extremly fun to play if you just want to  casually get spooked for a few hours, but if your actually trying to rank up....the killers are toxic and the survivors are even more toxic to deal with. This game has a lot of potential, but i just cant reccomend it as it is now until there are some major changes to it :/ and to be honest i dont even know why im writing this, the devs wont even look at it anyways because their probably too busy making the next killer/survivor designs.

Dead by Daylight is a great game that I would recommend to any of my friends who enjoy spooks. Admitedly yes as other negative reviews say there are bugs, the game is not perfect, and some of the killers are pretty damn strong. But the core aspect of the game "Horror" rings true despite these shortcomings.

There is a very attentive design approach to Dead by Daylights horror theme and that horror is derived from adversity--a point that is missed on a lot of players. If the game were easy, or balanced you would not feel even a semblence of horror because you'd always have a way out. The cold truth of the matter is that sometimes you will queue into a game and you will die. Sometimes you might even be the first to die. And thats part of the experience. It creates that tone and atmosphere that can only be established in the time you spend at whatever map you're on. 

Adapting is a key part of the survivor experience. Learning what does and doesn't work through trial and error. Research and study, and grinding points to get addons that will increase your odds. I want to place special attention to the level up system in the game because its probably the best format for a horror type game like this. As you level you'll find that the 'entity' the being that controls all these games will try and eat your level ups and perks. This means you have to carefully strategize how to get in and out of the bloodweb to get the most out of each level. This ideology of optimization and adaptability is what the survivor experience is all about.

And when all is said and done, if you're having a hard time as a survivor, that means its time to truly embrace the entity and play a killer.

Killer is the most fun aspect of the game to me. its like playing as an endgame boss and exerting power and fear unto your enemies. I would say to still play survivor to get a hang of the game and get map knowledge before trying killer, but once you do you'll find a very fun gory game of hide and seek.

Endless strategies, endless possibilities. The games can range from very fun to very frustrating and all the feelings in between. Its about learning, and applying what you learn to make yourself a better player, all the marks of a good video game.
Pretty fun when i can actually get into a game. takes ages to get in agme whether your survor or killer. so make the most out of a game you join as it will be the only one for a while....

Prima Leatherface ed ora Freddy hanno decretato la fine del divertimento in questo gioco. Con le loro abilità e perck è praticamente un impresa uscirne vivi. Aumento dei ganci e loro rigenerazione sono il tocco finale.
Io capisco che i DLC debbano essere venduti, ma a costo di rovinare un gioco credo che sia esagerato.
Oltretutto da quando è uscito freddy non riesco a fare partite da killer ci sono attese estenuanti per trovare un party di survivor ( dai 5 ai 10 minuti di attesa per partita è assurdo ).
Spero in un bilanciamento veloce che possa far divertire di nuovo.
really good game :)

ok ok, [b]serious review[/b] this time
This game is fun, let me get that out of the way now. If you enjoy the gameplay it's easy to lose track of time and end up spending 3+ hours a day on it. Unfortunately, that's where the positive ends. A lack of transparency from the devs, a hacking issue comparable to that of TF2, and a MASSIVE grind makes this game miserable to play in 2022.

That being said... DbD is like a gram of blow to me. Pimp daddy BHVR knows that it's addicting, and I'm putting out more than I'm willing to admit. If you haven't played it already, I don't recommend you start. If you [i]have[/i], find a way out before it's too late.

Jogo muito bom, sem grandes problemas técnicos (até agora somente duas partidas vi pessoas cair do mapa, quando existiu uma conexão muito ruim do host). Divertido jogar tanto de sobrevivente como de assassino.
Algumas coisas poderiam ser diferentes como escolher partidas livres ou ranqueadas, pelo menos até agora não encontrei isto (a não ser que seja com amigos). E realmente o Freddy está completamente desbalanceado no jogo, é possível correr e se esconder de todos os assassinos exceto Freddy, pois ele corre mais do que os sobreviventes e os vê o tempo todo no mundo dos sonhos o que está atrapalhando as partidas consideravelmente, muitos jogadores até saem da partida quando vêem que estão fugindo do Freddy.
Fora isto não vejo muitos outros pontos negativos.

Edit: 
depois das modificações no Freddy e o frenesi de jogar apenas com ele diminuiu acredito que as análises negativas devido a este assassino e minhas colocações já não sejam necessárias. Ademais o jogo atualmente parece estar tendo dificuldades para iniciar as partidas. A despeito de ter muitos jogadores em certas situações está se esperando bastante tempo para começar partidas e algumas vezes as mesmas não iniciam devido a uma nova comunicação que está existindo com o server deles.

Independente disto o jogo continua sendo muito bom, espero que mais assassinos sejam adicionados ainda e repensado o balanceamento dos sobreviventes. Mesmo tendo falado do Freddy anteriormente, não posso esquecer de mencionar que em grande parte o jogo favorece muito mais os sobreviventes, o que pode dificultar no futuro encontrar quem queira jogar de assassino, dado que em ranks mais altos é muito mais fácil ver os Sobreviventes dando rodeio do que o oposto. Alguns têm reclamado da minha posição inicial contra o Freddy não compreendem que existem diferentes tipos de jogadores e as mudanças no Freddy são muito mais para os jogadores com menos experiência do que para os experientes, para os quais Freddy ou qualquer outro são apenas um bobalhão correndo pra lá e pra cá com uma arma na mão.

エアプ運営がキラー調整をしていることで有名な1vs4の鬼ごっこゲーム
[h1] キラー側でプレイする時の注意点 [/h1]
[b] ・ストレスを感じたらすぐにやめましょう[/b] 
・お鯖様の煽りに屈しないようにしましょう
・1度に3~4人が入ってきたらPTの疑いがあります、諦めましょう
・煽りお鯖様を見つけたら何としても捕まえましょう
・上へ行けば行くほどVC勢が増えます。やはり諦めましょう
・初心者落としが一定数います、気を付けましょう
・脱出ゲート前や緊急出口前でじっとしているのは大半が煽りです([strike]いわゆるサビ残[/strike]出て行かないと試合が終了しないため迷惑)。どうすることもできないので無視しましょう
・チャット欄で罵倒されることもあります。試合が終わったら早めにぬけましょう。

Q.フレディ出てからバランス崩壊とか言われてたけど？
A.マイケルとかハントレスが出た直後も同じこと言われていました、対策を覚えればレイスくん以下の性能と一部では囁かれています。気にせず自分の好きなキラーを使えばいいと思います。

Q.キャンパーって言われた！
A.貴方が本当にキャンプまがいのことをしていたか、もしくはただの負け惜しみです
